descriptionHtml:
[size=4]To run this mod you need Dragonborn DLC and lastest version of Skyrim.
I make this mod because i like Sahrotaar and is good to have them as a follower.
You can find them at the Riverwood entrance.
Mod still have a lot of bugs and i will try as quick as i can to fix it.
Sahrotaar is on the land,when the fight starts,he flying and when battle finished he wont land,i will try make a shout to land Sahrotaar in next update.
[/size]
author: Sahrotaar74
